General.Name: Norman Broadbent Plc
General.Description: Norman Broadbent plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides professional services in the United Kingdom and internationally. It offers a portfolio of services, including board, interim management and consulting, leadership development, executive search, and research and insight services. The company was incorporated in 1936 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Millbank Tower, London, United Kingdom, SW1P 4QP
